parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Force animation of pylon to given state, -1 for reset to engine handling, can cause weapon inoperative, because weapon is released  when pylon state <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>1. Supports pylon name since Arma 3 v1.93.145594

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''animatePylon''' [pylon, animphase, instant]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [pylon, animphase, instant] : [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pylon: [[Number]] or [[String]] - pylon index (index starts from 1) or pylon name (see [[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]] Example 4)
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> animphase: [[Number]] - animation phase (0...1)
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> instant (Optional): [[Boolean]] - animate immediately

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[animatePylon]] [1, 0.5];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[animatePylon]] ["pylon1", 0.5];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[animatePylon]] ["pylon1", 1, [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Vehicle Loadouts]],[[getCompatiblePylonMagazines]],[[getPylonMagazines]],[[setAmmoOnPylon]],[[animateBay]],[[setPylonsPriority]],[[setPylonLoadout]]
</value></part></template></root>
